order

Class BranchMenuController

  • java.lang.Object
    • order.BranchMenuController

  • public class BranchMenuController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to show menu of a supplier to the customer The controller loads dishes of the supplier from the DB Divides the dishes by type user can choose dish from menu, than select the dish details and add it to the cart when there are dishes in the cart user can view the cart and remove dishes or continue to checkout
    Since:
    01.01.2022
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matan Weisberg

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private javafx.scene.control.Button add_btn
      add_btn = add a dish to cart after fill dish details
      private javafx.scene.control.Button appetizer_btn
      group of buttons in hbox each button takes you to the menu type
      private javafx.scene.control.Button back_btn
      back_btn = button to return to last screen (choose supplier)
      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView back_image
      back image to get back to last screen
      private javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane borderPane
      the pane of all the menu, when loading the screen used to disable the menu until load is complete
      private javafx.scene.control.Label cart_count
      cart_count = lbl to set the amount of items in cart
      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView cart_img
      cart_img = cart img using as a button to open the cart,only available when cart has items
      private javafx.scene.layout.VBox cart_items_vbox
      m cart_items_vbox = vbox loading all dishes in cart
      private javafx.scene.layout.VBox cart_vbox
      vbox containing all the cart details, appears when clickin cart img
      private java.lang.String currentLvl
      saves the selected size, saves the selected cookin lvl ,saves the selected extras

      saves the selected size, saves the selected cookin lvl ,saves the selected extras

      group of buttons in hbox each button takes you to the menu type

      group of buttons in hbox each button takes you to the menu type

      textfield to input dish extras
      private java.lang.String extras
      saves the selected size, saves the selected cookin lvl ,saves the selected extras
      private java.lang.Boolean firstClick
      used for showing cart screem
      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView green_v_img
      img of a green v, appears when a dish is added to the cart
      private int i
      used to count the selectes dish options
      private javafx.scene.layout.GridPane items_grid
      items_grid = grid pain containing all dishes in the category

      group of buttons in hbox each button takes you to the menu type
      private javafx.scene.layout.HBox menu_categories
      uses to get all the button for menu categories
      private MyListener menuListener
      listen to what dish was chosen and set it

      shows progress when loading screen
